Name: Turn Control
Title: Yelan: Turn Control
Source: Reward for inviting Yelan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Turn Control
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1209]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1209] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12092]</color> once.
Roll Phase: If $[A1209], who has this card equipped, is on the field, 1 Elemental Dice will be rolled as $[K411] for each Elemental Type in your party. (Max 3)
(You must have $[A1209] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
